content: video tutorial is available for this pattern https //youtu be/unmugznkdge introducing our latest crochet pattern the no sew hanging crochet basket this hanging basket is perfect for storing your favorite items while adding a touch of style to your home decor and the best part no sewing is required it s quick to make and can be customized with your favorite colors to match your home decor the basket is worked all in one piece using the linked half_double_crochet stitch throughout the majority of the pattern which creates a sturdy and textured fabric medium weight cotton yarn is recommended for this project one basket requires about 185 yards the finished basket measures approximately 7 inches wide and 13 inches in height with an additional 2 inches for the ring that it uses to hang from difficulty level easy instructions are provided for the half_double_crochet stitch along with links to an individual tutorial the written pattern includes instructions for creating the basket including how to make the hanging loop and stitch the seams together the pdf includes 2 written patterns one with pictures and another printer friendly version without pictures
